name: Heavy Duty Space Suit
pages: This is the space suit for high-mass, thick atmosphere planets, like Venus. This space suit is fire resistant and useful for surviving hot, fiery places.$(br2)Wearing the complete suit gives the player a small jump boost.

pages.text: The gold implemented in the chestpiece counts as gold armor to make you neutral with piglins.
pages.title: Heavy Duty Chestplate
